scripts.dev: npm run css && budo ./src/index.tsx --live --pushstate --host=localhost --port=8888 --base=/ --serve=index.js -- -t sheetify/transform -t [ babelify ]  -p [ tsify ]
scripts.dist: tsc && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run assets
scripts.assets: cp -R assets lib && cp index.html lib/index.html
scripts.browserify: browserify src/index.ts -p [ tsify ] -g babelify -g uglifyify -o lib/index.js
